room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: Had a terrific time, really enjoyed the challenge and it is not easy lol so happy we have this in Kansas City now

room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: What a great experience and a fun group activity! Loved the challenge even though we didn't quite make it out in time. Kudos to the creative masterminds!!

room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: It was so much fun!!!! Highly recommend especially to groups of about 5 or 6. Great teambuilding excercise

room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: My family did the Secret Agent room and escaped! It was so much fun, we have already signed up for our next trip! The staff was incredibly friendly and the monitors were very helpful. Would definitely recommend for family fun and a nice challenge!

room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: My family and I did the Secret Agent room today and couldn't have had more fun! The staff was helpful, friendly, and thoroughly explained the mission to us. Would def recommend for family fun!

room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: This was absolutely a blast. 8 of us took on the secret agent room. It really was entertaining, made your brain think and encouraged team work. When we finally figured it out we all screamed; it was such a rush!! Cannot wait to do it again. The staff were seriously the nicest people too.

room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: Had a great time. I will 100% come back. Such a fun unique different experience.
